metadata.Title: CVE-2013-7069 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
ack 2.00 through 2.11_02 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary codevia a (1) --pager, (2) --regex, or (3) --output option in a .ackrc file ina directory to be searched.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-7069` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ack-grep - 2.12-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ack-grep package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.12-1').
